titles.title: Student Testing Improvement and Accountability Act
Student Testing Improvement and Accountability Act
A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to clarify when certain academic assessments shall be administered.
Student Testing Improvement and Accountability Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
